channel.title: Funniest old drunk ever!
channel.description:
Well, quite recently, a friend of mine introduced me to a man by the name of Worth McDonald. He was an elderly man, around the age of 50, and he rang him up. I couldn't stop laughing after our first conversations, and began to record our conversations. I have now made a website with my friend, and we are beginning to upload some of the conversations we had for others to hear. Please come register and listen! Hope you enjoy listening! I have a ton more to upload!
http://worthmcdonald.com
~Jewsus~
